sqlMap.statement:
SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.TEMPLATEKEY,R.PARTY_ID,R.FLOW_ID, R.PARTY_CHN_NAME,R.PARTY_CLASS_CD, R.LEVELKEY,R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL, R.EMENDATIONLEVEL,R.MODIFYDATE,R.STATUS_CD, R.STATISTIC_DT, R.ORGANKEY,R.TEMPTYPE,R.CURR_POST,R.CREATE_DT,R.MODIFY_CD,R.LASTLEVELKEY,R.LASTCHECKFLAG,R.TEMPCATEGORY,HCHECK_STATUS FROM T37_PARTY_RESULT R
R.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
R.status_cd=#status_cd#
party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
R.CURR_POST =#post_id#
R.TEMPCATEGORY IN ($tempcategory_c$)
R.TEMPCATEGORY =#tempcategory_s#
STATISTIC_DT >= #statistic_dt#
STATISTIC_DT <= #statistic_dt_end#
MODIFYDATE >= #modifydate#
MODIFYDATE <= #modifydate_end#
CREATE_DT >= #create_dt#
CREATE_DT <= #create_dt_end#
R.PARTY_ID =#party_id#
R.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL = #fristappralevel#
R.emendationlevel=#emendationlevel#
R.lastlevelkey=#lastlevelkey#
R.LEVELKEY = #levelkey#
R.HCHECK_STATUS = #hcheck_status#
ORDER BY R.STATUS_CD
ORDER BY R.ORGANKEY
ORDER BY R.PARTY_CHN_NAME
ORDER BY R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL
ORDER BY R.STATISTIC_DT
DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T37_PARTY_RESULT R
R.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
R.status_cd=#status_cd#
R.CURR_POST =#post_id#
R.TEMPCATEGORY IN ($tempcategory_c$)
R.TEMPCATEGORY =#tempcategory_s#
STATISTIC_DT >= #statistic_dt#
STATISTIC_DT <= #statistic_dt_end#
MODIFYDATE >= #modifydate#
MODIFYDATE <= #modifydate_end#
CREATE_DT >= #create_dt#
CREATE_DT <= #create_dt_end#
R.PARTY_ID =#party_id#
R.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL = #fristappralevel#
R.emendationlevel=#emendationlevel#
R.lastlevelkey=#lastlevelkey#
R.LEVELKEY = #levelkey#
R.HCHECK_STATUS = #hcheck_status#

SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.TEMPLATEKEY,R.PARTY_ID,R.FLOW_ID, R.PARTY_CHN_NAME,R.PARTY_CLASS_CD, R.LEVELKEY,R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL, R.EMENDATIONLEVEL, R.MODIFYDATE,R.STATUS_CD, R.STATISTIC_DT, R.ORGANKEY,R.TEMPTYPE,R.CURR_POST,R.CREATE_DT,R.MODIFY_CD,R.LASTLEVELKEY,R.LASTCHECKFLAG,R.TEMPCATEGORY
,R.rate_source
, '1' as rate_source
, '2' as rate_source
FROM
V37_PARTY_RESULT R
T37_PARTY_RESULT R
T37_PRESULT_AUDIT R
WHERE 1=1
R.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
R.status_cd=#status_cd#
party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
R.CURR_POST =#post_id#
R.TEMPCATEGORY IN ($tempcategory_c$)
R.TEMPCATEGORY =#tempcategory_s#
STATISTIC_DT >= #statistic_dt#
STATISTIC_DT <= #statistic_dt_end#
MODIFYDATE >= #modifydate#
MODIFYDATE <= #modifydate_end#
CREATE_DT >= #create_dt#
CREATE_DT <= #create_dt_end#
R.PARTY_ID =#party_id#
R.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL = #fristappralevel#
R.emendationlevel=#emendationlevel#
R.lastlevelkey=#lastlevelkey#
ORDER BY R.STATUS_CD
ORDER BY R.ORGANKEY
ORDER BY R.PARTY_CHN_NAME
ORDER BY R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL
ORDER BY R.STATISTIC_DT
DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM
V37_PARTY_RESULT R
T37_PARTY_RESULT R
T37_PRESULT_AUDIT R
WHERE 1=1
R.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
R.status_cd=#status_cd#
party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
R.CURR_POST =#post_id#
R.TEMPCATEGORY IN ($tempcategory_c$)
R.TEMPCATEGORY =#tempcategory_s#
STATISTIC_DT >= #statistic_dt#
STATISTIC_DT <= #statistic_dt_end#
MODIFYDATE >= #modifydate#
MODIFYDATE <= #modifydate_end#
CREATE_DT >= #create_dt#
CREATE_DT <= #create_dt_end#
R.PARTY_ID =#party_id#
R.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL = #fristappralevel#
R.emendationlevel=#emendationlevel#
R.lastlevelkey=#lastlevelkey#

UPDATE $table_name$ T SET T.STATUS_CD=#status_cd#,T.CURR_POST=#curr_post#
emendationlevel = #emendationlevel#
, levelkey = emendationlevel
modify_cd = #modify_cd#
modifier = #modifier#
modifydate = #modifydate#
lastscore = #lastscore#
audit_user = #audit_user#
audit_dt = #audit_dt#
check_user = #check_user#
check_dt = #check_dt#
rcheck_user = #rcheck_user#
rcheck_dt = #rcheck_dt#
return_user = #return_user#
return_dt = #return_dt#
return_reason = #return_reason#
nextstatistic_dt = #nextstatistic_dt#
WHERE T.RESULEKEY IN ($resulekey$)
T.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
T.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#
T.ORGANKEY IN ($organkey_s$)

UPDATE $table_name$ T SET T.STATUS_CD=#batch_status_cd#,T.CURR_POST=#batch_curr_post#
T.modify_cd = #modify_cd#
, levelkey = emendationlevel
T.audit_user = #audit_user#
T.audit_dt = #audit_dt#
T.check_user = #check_user#
T.check_dt = #check_dt#
T.rcheck_user = #rcheck_user#
T.rcheck_dt = #rcheck_dt#
WHERE 1=1
T.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
$cond_sql$
T.status_cd=#status_cd#
T.CURR_POST =#post_id#
T.TEMPCATEGORY IN ($tempcategory_c$)
T.TEMPCATEGORY =#tempcategory_s#
STATISTIC_DT >= #statistic_dt#
STATISTIC_DT <= #statistic_dt_end#
MODIFYDATE >= #modifydate#
MODIFYDATE <= #modifydate_end#
CREATE_DT >= #create_dt#
CREATE_DT <= #create_dt_end#
T.PARTY_ID =#party_id#
T.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
T.FRISTAPPRALEVEL = #fristappralevel#
T.emendationlevel=#emendationlevel#
T.lastlevelkey=#lastlevelkey#

SELECT A.PARTY_ID,A.AUDIT_NO,A.LAST_UPD_DT,A.LAST_UPD_USER,A.LEVEL_BEFORE_ADJUST,A.LEVEL_AFTER_ADJUST, A.RES_POST_ID, A.ADJUST_REASON,A.POST_ID,B.STAFCODE FROM $table_name$ A,t00_user B WHERE A.LAST_UPD_USER=B.USERNAME AND A.RSLTKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
order by A.AUDIT_NO desc
SELECT PARTY_ID,LEVELKEY,AUDIT_USER,AUDIT_DT,CHECK_USER,CHECK_DT,RCHECK_USER,RCHECK_DT,MODIFY_CD FROM T37_PARTY_RESULT_CURR WHERE PARTY_ID=#party_id#

SELECT A.PARTY_ID,A.AUDIT_NO,A.LAST_UPD_DT,A.LAST_UPD_USER,A.LEVEL_BEFORE_ADJUST,A.LEVEL_AFTER_ADJUST, A.RES_POST_ID, A.ADJUST_REASON,A.POST_ID,B.PARTY_CHN_NAME,B.PARTY_CLASS_CD,B.CHECK_USER,B.RCHECK_USER,B.CREATE_DT FROM T37_LEVEL_AUDIT A,T37_PARTY_RESULT B WHERE A.PARTY_ID=#party_id# AND A.PARTY_ID =B.PARTY_ID

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $table_name$ A WHERE A.RSLTKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#

INSERT INTO $tablename$( AUDIT_NO,PARTY_ID,STATISTIC_DT,RSLTKEY,LEVEL_BEFORE_ADJUST, LEVEL_AFTER_ADJUST,ADJUST_REASON,RES_POST_ID,POST_ID,LAST_UPD_DT,LAST_UPD_USER,GRANULARITY,ORGANKEY) values( #audit_no#,#party_id#,#statistic_dt#,#rsltkey#,#level_before_adjust#, #level_after_adjust#,#adjust_reason#,#res_post_id#,#post_id#,#last_upd_dt#,#last_upd_user#,#granularity#,#organkey# )

SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.TEMPLATEKEY,R.PARTY_ID, R.PARTY_CHN_NAME, R.LEVELKEY,R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL, R.EMENDATIONLEVEL, R.STATISTIC_DT,R.MODIFYDATE, R.ORGANKEY,R.PARTY_CLASS_CD,R.TEMPTYPE,R.CURR_POST,R.CREATE_DT,R.MODIFY_CD,LASTLEVELKEY,LASTCHECKFLAG FROM T37_PARTY_RESULT_UH R
R.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
R.PARTY_ID =#party_id#
R.ORGANKEY = #organkey#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T37_PARTY_RESULT_UH R
R.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
R.PARTY_ID =#party_id#
R.ORGANKEY = #organkey#

SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.PARTY_ID,R.GSKEY,R.STATISTIC_DT,R.INDICKEY,R.TEMPLATEKEY,R.GRANULARITY,R.INDICVAL FROM $table_name$ R WHERE R.RESULEKEY =#resulekey#
R.ORGANKEY=#organkey#

select a.elementkey,a.upelementkey,a.base_occ as base_occ_d,a.score as score_d,'1' as js_type,b.is_last from T37_APPR_BAS_RSLT_MODI a left join T31_DEF_ELEMENT b on a.elementkey=b.elementkey where resulekey=#resulekey#
a.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
union select elementkey,upelementkey,base_occ as base_occ_d,0 as score_d,js_type,is_last from T31_DEF_ELEMENT where is_last='0' and templatekey=#templatekey#

SELECT T.ELEMENTKEY, T.UPELEMENTKEY,T.BASE_OCC as base_occ_d, C.SCORE AS SCORE, CASE WHEN C.OLD_SCORE IS NULL THEN T.ELEMENT_SCORE ELSE C.OLD_SCORE END AS OLD_SCORE, '1' as js_type,t.is_last FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENT T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.ELEMENTKEY,A.SCORE,A.OLD_SCORE from $table_name$ A WHERE 1=1 and A.RESULEKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
) C ON C.ELEMENTKEY = T.ELEMENTKEY WHERE T.IS_LAST='1'
T.TEMPLATEKEY=#templatekey#
and t.treelaye >=#treelaye# union select elementkey,upelementkey,base_occ as base_occ_d,0 as score,element_score as old_score,js_type,is_last from T31_DEF_ELEMENT where is_last='0' and templatekey=#templatekey# and treelaye >=#treelaye#

SELECT T.ELEMENTKEY,T.BASE_OCC,T.UPELEMENTKEY,T.TEMPLATEKEY,T.ELEMENTNAME,T.JS_TYPE FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENT T WHERE T.IS_LAST='0'
T.TEMPLATEKEY=#templatekey#

SELECT T.ELEMENTKEY, T.UPELEMENTKEY, T.ELEMENTNAME, T.IS_AUDIT,T.BASE_OCC, T.DES, C.SCORE, CASE WHEN C.OLD_SCORE IS NULL THEN T.ELEMENT_SCORE ELSE C.OLD_SCORE END AS OLD_SCORE FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENT T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.ELEMENTKEY,A.SCORE,A.OLD_SCORE from $table_name$ A WHERE 1=1
A.RESULEKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
) C ON C.ELEMENTKEY = T.ELEMENTKEY WHERE T.IS_LAST='1'
T.TEMPLATEKEY=#templatekey#

INSERT INTO T37_APPR_BAS_RSLT_MODI(RESULEKEY,ELEMENTKEY,PARTY_ID,STATISTIC_DT,BASE_OCC,SCORE,OLD_SCORE,UPELEMENTKEY,GRANULARITY,BASIC_VAL,BASE_SCORE,ORGANKEY) SELECT #resulekey#, T.ELEMENTKEY, #party_id#, #statistic_dt#, T.BASE_OCC, CASE WHEN C.SCORE IS NULL THEN T.ELEMENT_SCORE ELSE C.SCORE END AS SCORE, CASE WHEN C.OLD_SCORE IS NULL THEN T.ELEMENT_SCORE ELSE C.OLD_SCORE END AS OLD_SCORE, T.UPELEMENTKEY, #granularity#, C.BASIC_VAL, T.BASE_SCORE, #organkey# FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENT T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.ELEMENTKEY,A.SCORE,A.OLD_SCORE,A.BASIC_VAL FROM $table_name$ A WHERE 1=1
A.RESULEKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
) C ON C.ELEMENTKEY = T.ELEMENTKEY WHERE T.IS_LAST='1'
T.TEMPLATEKEY=#templatekey#
$sql$

SELECT max(T.TREELAYE) FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENT T
T.TEMPLATEKEY=#templatekey#

SELECT A.RESULEKEY,A.ELEMENT_SCORE,A.STATISTIC_DT,A.ORGANKEY,T.ELEMENTKEY,T.BASE_OCC,T.UPELEMENTKEY,T.ELEMENTNAME,T.TEMPLATEKEY FROM T37_APPR_ELEM_RSLT A,T31_DEF_ELEMENT T WHERE A.ELEMENTKEY=T.ELEMENTKEY AND A.UPELEMENTKEY IN (SELECT ELEMENTKEY FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENT WHERE TEMPLATEKEY=#templatekey# AND UPELEMENTKEY='-1' )
A.RESULEKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
A.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.PARTY_ID,R.ORGANKEY, R.PARTY_CHN_NAME, R.LEVELKEY,R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL, R.EMENDATIONLEVEL,R.TEMPTYPE,R.GRANULARITY,R.TEMPLATEKEY,R.MODIFY_CD,R.CREATE_DT, R.Modify_Cd, R.STATISTIC_DT,R.PARTY_CLASS_CD,R.CURR_POST,R.GSKEY,R.SCORE,R.LASTSCORE,R.RETURN_REASON,R.ORGANKEY,R.FLOW_ID,R.SCOREMODI_FLAG FROM $table_name$ R WHERE R.RESULEKEY=#resulekey#
party_id=#party_id#
R.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
R.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.PARTY_ID,R.ORGANKEY, R.PARTY_CHN_NAME, R.LEVELKEY,R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL, R.EMENDATIONLEVEL,R.TEMPTYPE,R.GRANULARITY,R.TEMPLATEKEY,R.MODIFY_CD,R.CREATE_DT, R.Modify_Cd, R.STATISTIC_DT,R.PARTY_CLASS_CD,R.CURR_POST,R.GSKEY,R.SCORE,R.LASTSCORE,R.RETURN_REASON,R.ORGANKEY,R.FLOW_ID,R.SCOREMODI_FLAG FROM $table_name$ R WHERE party_id=#party_id#
R.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
R.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

UPDATE $table_name$ T SET T.HCHECK_STATUS = #hcheck_status# WHERE T.RESULEKEY =#resulekey#
T.ORGANKEY=#organkey#

UPDATE $table_name$ T SET T.LASTSCORE = #lastscore#
T.SCOREMODI_FLAG = #scoremodi_flag#
WHERE T.RESULEKEY =#resulekey#
T.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
SELECT FLOW_TYPE,FLOW_ID,MODULE_ID FROM T31_FLOW WHERE MODULE_ID=#templatekey# AND FLOW_TYPE=#flow_type#

select orig_node,target_node,oper_id,levelkey,status,is_report,flow_id from t31_swith
oper_id = #oper_id#
orig_node = #orig_node#
flow_id = #flow_id#
levelkey = #levelkey#
select levelkey,levelname,minisclosed,maxisclosed,levelmin as levelmin_d,levelmax as levelmax_d from T31_risk_level WHERE flag='1'

select base_occ,base_score,caltype,des,js_type,element_score,elementkey,elementname,is_last,is_sum,riskcaltype,templatekey,treelaye,upelementkey,indickey,valnum,is_audit from t31_def_element t where 1=1
t.templatekey = #templatekey#
UPELEMENTKEY = #upelementkey#
treelaye = #treelaye#
order by treelaye desc
